title: "RoboNotify Wallpapers"
content: RoboNotify Wallpapers is a website that offers a collection of wallpapers featuring a simple graphic of a robot arm holding a smartphone, with a space for placing important notifications or messages. These wallpapers are perfect for those who want to stay organized and keep track of their tasks in a fun and stylish way. With a variety of colors and designs to choose from, there's a RoboNotify wallpaper for every taste and preference. So why settle for a boring wallpaper when you can have one that not only looks great but also helps you stay on top of your game? Check out our collection today and give your phone a fresh new look!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a simple graphic of a robot arm holding a smartphone, with a space for placing important notifications or messages."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
